text: Leonor Oyarzún Ivanovic (10 March 1919 - 21 January 2022) was the First Lady of Chile from 1990 until 1994. She was the wife of former President Patricio Aylwin. Oyarzún was born on 1919 in Temuco. She married Aylwin on 29 September 1948 and they had five children. They had 14 grandchildren (among them, telenovela actress Paz Bascuñán).Nace "Leonor" , la hija de Paz Bascuñán, La Segunda Aylwin died in April 2016. Oyarzún turned 100 in March 2019. She died on 21 January 2022 in Santiago de Chile, aged 102. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2022 deaths Category:First Ladies of Chile Category:Chilean centenarians Category:People from Araucanía Region
title: Leonor Oyarzún
